info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 7:39AM EDT until April 5 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Cleveland OH
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...
Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County.
For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Nimishillen Creek near North Industry.
* WHEN...From this morning to this evening.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water backs up into a mobile home park on Cleveland Southwest Avenue in Canton Township.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/cle.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 545 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING
